title: A Study on the ideas of feminism which are revealed through the famale characters' point of view on marriage, education, and job in Shaw's Mrs. Warren's profession
abstract: This thesis analyzes the ideas of feminism which are revealed through the female characters? point of view on marriage, job and education in Shaw?s Mrs. Warren?s Profession. The reason why the writer chooses the topic because it is very interesting to see Mrs. Warren as the women from Victorian era, which in her the writer already able to reveal the feminist ideas. While in that era the term feminism had not been popular yet. Moreover the aim of the study is to find out the point of view from Mrs. Warren concerning marriage, education, and job; in which the writer could reveal the ideas of feminism. For the methodology, the writer use the background of feminism, general concepts in feminism, also concepts of feminism on: marriage, education, and job. In the analysis, the writer will use those concepts to analyze the ideas of feminism as seen from the point of view of Mrs. Warren concerning marriage, education, and job. The final results are Mrs. Warren has her own perceptions about how women suppose to commit in marriage, education and job. Those perceptions are based on the feminist concepts and ideas that women need to earn their right and dignity.
subjects: SHAW, GEORGE BERNARD, 1856-1950. MRS WARREN'S PROFESSION-STUDY AND TEACHING; ENGLISH DRAMA--19TH CENTURY--STUDY AND TEACHING
